mapper.sql: id, owner, money, name, expected_date, customer_id, stage, type, source, activity_id, contacts_id, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_transaction (id, owner, money, name, expected_date, customer_id, stage, type, source, activity_id, contacts_id, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectedDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{contactsId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR})

update tbl_transaction set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expected_date = #{expectedDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=CHAR}, contacts_id = #{contactsId,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

mapper.select: select ttan.id,tu.name as owner,ttan.money,ttan.name,ttan.expected_date,ttan.customer_id, tdv.value as stage,tdv1.value as type,tdv2.value as source,ttan.activity_id,ttan.contacts_id, tu1.name as create_by,ttan.create_time,tu2.name as edit_by,ttan.edit_time,ttan.description, ttan.contact_summary,ttan.next_contact_time from tbl_transaction ttan join tbl_user tu on ttan.owner = tu.id join tbl_user tu1 on ttan.create_by = tu1.id join tbl_dictionary_value tdv on ttan.stage = tdv.id left join tbl_dictionary_value tdv1 on ttan.type = tdv1.id left join tbl_dictionary_value tdv2 on ttan.source = tdv2.id left join tbl_user tu2 on ttan.edit_by = tu2.id where ttan.customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR} order by ttan.create_time desc

select ttan.id,tu.name as owner,ttan.money,ttan.name,ttan.expected_date,ttan.customer_id, tdv.value as stage,tdv1.value as type,tdv2.value as source,ttan.activity_id,ttan.contacts_id, tu1.name as create_by,ttan.create_time,tu2.name as edit_by,ttan.edit_time,ttan.description, ttan.contact_summary,ttan.next_contact_time from tbl_transaction ttan join tbl_user tu on ttan.owner = tu.id join tbl_user tu1 on ttan.create_by = tu1.id join tbl_dictionary_value tdv on ttan.stage = tdv.id left join tbl_dictionary_value tdv1 on ttan.type = tdv1.id left join tbl_dictionary_value tdv2 on ttan.source = tdv2.id left join tbl_user tu2 on ttan.edit_by = tu2.id where ttan.contacts_id = #{contactsId,jdbcType=CHAR} order by ttan.create_time desc
mapper.update:
update tbl_transaction
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expected_date = #{expectedDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR},
stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=CHAR},
contacts_id = #{contactsId,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ttan.id,tu.name as owner,ttan.money,ttan.name,ttan.expected_date,ttan.customer_id, tdv.value as stage,tdv1.value as type,tdv2.value as source,ttan.activity_id,ttan.contacts_id, tu1.name as create_by,ttan.create_time,tu2.name as edit_by,ttan.edit_time,ttan.description, ttan.contact_summary,ttan.next_contact_time,tcu.name as customer_name, concat(tco.full_name,tco.appellation) as contacts_name, tma.name as activity_name,tdv.order_no as order_no from tbl_transaction ttan join tbl_user tu on ttan.owner = tu.id join tbl_user tu1 on ttan.create_by = tu1.id join tbl_dictionary_value tdv on ttan.stage = tdv.id left join tbl_dictionary_value tdv1 on ttan.type = tdv1.id left join tbl_dictionary_value tdv2 on ttan.source = tdv2.id left join tbl_user tu2 on ttan.edit_by = tu2.id left join tbl_customer tcu on ttan.customer_id = tcu.id left join (select tco.id,tco.full_name,tdv.value as appellation from tbl_contacts tco left join tbl_dictionary_value tdv on tco.appellation = tdv.id) tco on ttan.contacts_id = tco.id left join tbl_marketing_activities tma on ttan.activity_id = tma.id where ttan.id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select tdv.value as name,count(*) as value from tbl_transaction ttran left join tbl_dictionary_value tdv on ttran.stage = tdv.id group by ttran.stage
